individualDescription: Personal one-on-one guidance focused on your unique goals.
groupDescription: Transformative group training that blends mental coaching, biofeedback, and collective accountability.
individualIntro: OmniMental individual sessions are one-on-one intensives where we map triggers fast, regulate the nervous system, and build crystal-clear rituals for decisions and energy.
individualProcessSteps: Explore & set objectives – we map triggers and align on the outcome of the session.
Guided intervention – breathwork, biofeedback, reframing, and light hypnosis create immediate change.
Integration & daily ritual – you leave with precise steps, support materials, and accountability.
individualSections: 4-session sprint (4–5 weeks) – mental reset for specific objectives and quick clarity.
3-month program (6 sessions) – sustained transformation, habit consolidation, and between-session support.
Annual mentorship (12 sessions) – inner leadership for high-performing professionals with constant stakes.

individualHighlights.title: Why individual sessions?
individualHighlights.description: Individual sessions are one-on-one meetings between the client and a professional (coach, therapist, or psychotherapist) designed to support change, clarity, and personal or professional development.

individualHighlights.title: How we work inside the session
individualHighlights.description: We begin with diagnostics and objectives, then blend breathwork, CBT, ACT, light hypnosis, and biofeedback to create fast, safe interventions.

individualHighlights.title: What you receive between sessions
individualHighlights.description: You get an audio recap, mini exercises, reminders for daily integration, and follow-up over email within 24 hours.

individualFooter: All sessions take place in an ethical, confidential setting focused on development and optimisation, not on diagnosis or psychological treatment.

individualFaq.question: How long is a session?
individualFaq.answer: 60–75 minutes, depending on the topic and the integration work needed.

individualFaq.question: Where do we meet?
individualFaq.answer: Online via Zoom or, on request, in the Bucharest studio. We choose what keeps you most focused.

individualFaq.question: What if I need to reschedule?
individualFaq.answer: Give at least 24h notice and we move the session with no penalty. In emergencies, we always find a workaround.
